description: A high-quality pump with that will stand the test of time. It has has an accurate digital gauge that’s easy to read, and a bleed valve that helps if you pump too much. Plus, you can make a quick change from Presta to Schrader,CNC-machined aluminum barrel and base.Easy to read 9cm digital gauge.ABS1 Pro aluminum flip thread chuck.Extra-long braided nylon hose.Pump head is compatible with both Presta and Schrader valves.
name: Lezyne Alloy Digital Drive Floor Pump
